thoughts.text: Now that we have a list of websites that provide information about fun activities to do in New York City, we can use the `browse_website` command to explore each website and gather more information about the activities we are interested in.
thoughts.reasoning: Using the `browse_website` command will allow us to explore each website and gather more information about the activities we are interested in. This will help us make informed decisions about which activities we want to do.
thoughts.plan:
- Use the `browse_website` command to explore each website on our list
- Gather more information about the activities we are interested in
- Make a final list of the activities we want to do
- Use the `execute_shell` command to execute any necessary commands to get started
thoughts.criticism: We should be careful not to spend too much time browsing each website and not actually doing anything. We should also make sure to prioritize the activities we want to do so we don't miss out on anything.
thoughts.speak: Let's use the `browse_website` command to explore each website on our list and gather more information about the activities we are interested in.

args.question: What are some fun activities to do in New York City according to this website?
